extendedInfo.description: GPS Compass is a small but complete navigation tool, it leverages on both magnetic compass and GPS to give you always the most accurate information available.GPS Compass shows you distance and direction to geographical location (waypoint) you can define in many ways.GPS Compass calculates relevant points position by bearing and triangulation then saves the points as waypoints.You can see the waypoints on a map or you can use the map to define waypoints for navigation.The Basic version is limited in the number of waypoints you can define, it allows you up to 30 points.GPS Compass is the basis of the shortcoming Regatta application that adds a lot of feature for sail race navigation.A pdf version of the user manual can be found here: www.embedia.it/files/gps_compass/man_en_1_0.pdf

reviews.title: Bazakwards
reviews.comment: If I go to Settings and turn gps ON, this app says \342\200\234waiting for gps.\342\200\235   If I go to Settings and turn gps OFF, this app works fine.   I assume it\342\200\231s just me, but what the...
reviews.author: Jef Boyardee

reviews.title: Best vehicle compass!
reviews.comment: Over the past months I\'ve  tried pretty much all the compass apps for use in a my works van. The magnetic ones don\'t work with all the metal in the dash and the GPS ones trend to be too detailed or the numbers too small. This one I\'d nice, clear and simple, and goes into GPS mode over 5KM/H. It\'s very accurate and the speed is very clear too. Brilliant! Simply the best!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Saved day when Garmin plotter went u/s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Magnetic declination??
reviews.comment: I cannot determine whether the the bearings are  magnetic, or have been corrected for magnetic declination.  I tend to believe that they are not corrected, but since smartphone compasses are not very accurate, I have no confidence in that conclusion
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This application is fantastic. Perfect for boating and private pilots
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Gps doesn\'t turn off when you exit the app. Too bad, I really wanted to like this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow-utterly inaccurate.
reviews.comment: 2013-07-07 Bionic ICS. I don\'t know who\'s rating this five stars, as it indicates East as North for me! Junk.
reviews.author: David Back
